chapters.title: Chapter 37:  Performances in SamaraChapter 38:  An Old Acquaintance
chapters.info: Mairin Gome, p. 600 (424)—Operator of another menagerie in competition with Valan Luca's show. Since Luca's “boar horses” could be seen above the canvas when they reared, she raised her high-wire act above her tent wall to attract a similar audience.
